name: Neon Fighter
description:
Neon Fighter is an extremely challenging and fast-paced arcade game where your gun switches automatically every 7 seconds or so, creating very intense situations and testing your reflexes, adaptability, and decision-making skills.

Features:


- try to reach the highest score in score attack mode
- a soundtrack that complements the intensity and precision of the gameplay
- fight hordes of enemies frantically and at a fast pace
- dazzling visuals that are both retro and neon
